#summary Digital audio bitmatch transfer check program WasapiBitmatchChecker
#labels Featured

= !WasapiBitmatchChecker =

!WasapiBitmatchChecker is bitmatch transfer check program for PC audio devices.

= System requirements =

 * Windows 7 x64 or later
 * 8GB or more memory
 * PC audio interface with digital output
 * PC audio interface with digital input
